sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1064
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 1765 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 3491 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/test/swut/ZVAD_Task.c.test line 2171 ICAS1::ZVAD shall set the folowing signal:
IF: enComUserRequestReasonZV == 0 AND enComUserRequestReasonDWA == 34 OR enComUserRequestReasonDWA == 35 AND enComUserRequestReasonKFT == 0 AND enComUserRequestReasonQTG == 0 THEN s_zv_nm_aktiv := 2 // DWA LIN ELSE IF enComUserRequestReasonZV == 1...28 OR 255 OR enComUserRequestReasonDWA = 30..39 OR 255 OR enComUserRequestReasonKFT = 50, 52, 53 OR 255 OR enComUserRequestReasonQTG = 60 OR 255 THEN s_zv_nm_aktiv := 1 // DWA LIN + AB-CAN, C-CAN, K-CAN ELSE s_zv_nm_aktiv = 0
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1064 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1318
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 1765 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 3609 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/test/swut/ZVAD_Task.c.test line 2172 ICAS1::ZVAD shall set the folowing signal:
IF: ZV_eRWK_Umfeld_Pruefung == 1 AND pa_eRWK_Heck_sperren_bei_Hindernis == 1 THEN: s_zv_nm_aktiv := 3 // DWA LIN + AB-CAN, C-CAN, K-CAN, PDC
ELSE IF: enComUserRequestReasonZV == 0 AND enComUserRequestReasonDWA == 34 OR enComUserRequestReasonDWA == 35 AND enComUserRequestReasonKFT == 0 AND enComUserRequestReasonQTG == 0 THEN s_zv_nm_aktiv := 2 // DWA LIN ELSE IF enComUserRequestReasonZV == 1...28 OR 255 OR enComUserRequestReasonDWA = 30..39 OR 255 OR enComUserRequestReasonKFT = 50, 52, 53 OR 255 OR enComUserRequestReasonQTG = 60 OR 255 THEN s_zv_nm_aktiv := 1 // DWA LIN + AB-CAN, C-CAN, K-CAN ELSE s_zv_nm_aktiv = 0
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1318 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_856

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_857

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1452
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 2919 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/test/swut/ZVAD_Task.c.test line 4656 IF pc_BAP_aktiv == 0x0 THEN bFreigabeSpglAnklpn := (cp_Komfortbedienung_Spiegel_anklappen OR pa_spiegel_anklappen_bei_Verriegelung) ELSE bFreigabeSpglAnklpn := pBAP_spiegel_anklappen
Note: When pc_Marke = AUDI, the BAP personalization for the mirror folding is done using MirrorFoldIN function. When c_Marke != AUDI, the BAP personalization for the mirror folding is done using MirrorSetup function. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1452 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1327
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 2847 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/test/swut/ZVAD_Task.c.test line 5390 If cp_ZV_PiloPa_aktiv == 0x1 (active),
then the ICAS1 software shall enable the "RPA" function. ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1327 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1328
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/src/ZVAD_Task.c line 2847 Requirement is verified here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/ZVAD/Evo/test/swut/ZVAD_Task.c.test line 5391 IF: cp_ZV_PiloPa_aktiv == 0x1 AND IPA_02.Parken_aktives_System_02 == 0x2 // 2 = RPA THEN: s_ZV_Parken_aktives_System := 0x3 // 3 = PiloPa (remote controlled parking) ELSE: s_ZV_Parken_aktives_System := 0x0 // 0 = no system active ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1328 _ObjectType: Requirement SPR: not_SPR_reviewed ASIL: QM
